text: Martin Eric Ain (Martin Stricker; July 18, 1967 – October 21, 2017) was an American-born Swiss bass guitarist and songwriter. He was born in the United States.Martin Stricker was born in the United States. English was his first language: "I knew my strengths, I had been born in America and that English was my first language" -from Only Death Is Real, page 138 He was best known for being the former bassist of the influential extreme metal band Celtic Frost. He used the stage name Martin Eric Ain throughout his career in Celtic Frost. Ain died on October 21, 2017 following a heart attack in Zürich, Switzerland, aged 50.Celtic Frost bassist Martin Eric Ain dies at 50 ==References== ==Other websites== *Interview with Martin Eric Ain , Broward- Palm Beach New Times, 2006-10-19 *"Metal Israel Exclusive Kinda Interview with Martin Eric Ain" Category:1967 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American bass guitarists Category:American songwriters Category:Swiss musicians
title: Martin Eric Ain
